verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The perfect righteousness of God is witnessed in the Savior's blood; 'tis the cross of Christ we trace His righteousness, yet wondrous grace.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: The sinner who believes is free, can say, "The Savior died for me"; can point to the atoning blood and say, "This made my peace with God."
